description: **Kindness only** - bullying or toxicity will not be tolerated and will ensue fair punishment.
**Swearing is allowed** as long as it's **not** a slur or **targetted** at anyone.
punishment: Timeout → Temporary Ban → Permanent Timeout (Only if you are targetting someone) do these apply

description: **No slurs** - slur's no matter what will lead to a time out and if a continued offense is shown you will be banned.
**Do not spam ping or mass ping others**
**Always listen to moderators** when they say for you to do something.
**@Discord Support (PING FOR HELP) and @Game Support (PING FOR HELP)** are not to be used for jokes, these are meant to be used for serious things or for tickets.
**No spam or excessive messages** - Avoid sending repetitive messages, excessive emojis, or flooding channels with unnecessary content.
**No NSFW content** - This server is meant to be appropriate for all ages. No sexual, violent, or otherwise inappropriate content.
**No advertising or self-promotion** - Don't advertise other Discord servers, social media, or personal projects without permission from moderators.
**No ban evasion** - Creating alternate accounts to bypass bans will result in all accounts being permanently banned.
**No DM harassment** - Any bullying, illegal, or anything of the such used in dms to others in this server can result in you losing roles like Deercord Moderator, Deer Moderator, CC, Crafter.
**No doxxing or sharing personal information** - Never share someone else's personal information without their consent. This includes real names, addresses, phone numbers, etc.
**Use appropriate usernames and avatars** - Your username and profile picture should be appropriate and not offensive or misleading.
